greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Permutation of even numbers: a(n) = 2 * A265351(n).
comment: Iterating this sequence as 1, a(1), a(a(1)), a(a(a(1))), ... yields A264980.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..9841
program: def a030102(n): return 0 if n==0 else int(''.join(map(str, digits(n, 3)[1:][::-1])), 3)
return 1 if n==1 else reduce(mul, [1 if i==3 else i**f[i] for i in f])
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 07 2015
